metadata.Title: CVE-2021-23362 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description:
The package hosted-git-info before 3.0.8 are vulnerable to Regular Expression Denial of Service (ReDoS) via regular expression shortcutMatch in the fromUrl function in index.js. The affected regular expression exhibits polynomial worst-case time complexity.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2021-23362` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

node-hosted-git-info - 3.0.8-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: node-hosted-git-info package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.0.8-1').
